application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details required by condition 3[a - k] (excluding part h) (Submission of details - drawings or samples of materials as appropriate - in respect of: [a] section (1:2) and elevation (1:10) drawings of all proposed new windows, glazing and secondary glazing; [b] details of all new internal architectural features including skirtings, architraves, cornices, fireplaces and doors; [c] details of proposed new flooring including a section (1:2) of any proposed build up; [d] details of proposed new lighting; [e] section (1:2) and elevation (1:10) drawings of proposed new external staircase to front lightwell; [f] section (1:2) and elevation (1:10) drawings of proposed new metal entrance gate; [g] section (1:2) and elevation (1:10) drawings of the proposed new French doors (including glazing) for the second-floor roof terrace; [i] details of proposed new roof coverings; [j] details of new entrance door; and [k] details of new railings to roof terrace, shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the local planning authority before the relevant part of the work is begun, and the works shall not be carried out other than in accordance with the details so approved and shall thereafter be so maintained;) of listed building consent 22/01933 (Demolition and erection of 3-storey rear closet wing extension; erection of 2-storey rear infill extension; associated internal refurbishment works; installation of roof lights and solar panels to rear; repair works to front elevation brickwork; replacement of non-original front door; replacement of non-original front access stair to basement; installation of metal gate and renovation to sash windows throughout.)
